settings.about_subtitle: We’re inspired by the resilience and versatility of mushrooms.
settings.about_text: These little guys can thrive in the wildest of places, kind of like your favorite uncle who somehow survives on camping trips with just a pocketknife and a can of beans. Mushrooms have been used for centuries in various cultures for their health benefits, and we’re here to continue that tradition with a modern twist.

settings.meaning_text: The name "Emberix" comes from the word "ember," symbolizing hidden energy and warmth. Combined with the suffix "-ix," which adds a sense of dynamism and innovation, the name reflects the company's mission to ignite new ideas and inspiration. Emberix is the spark that fuels creativity and innovation in the supplement industry

settings.title: Quality from Nature
settings.text: We don't just aim for good, we strive for exceptional. Our products are crafted with the highest quality standards using 100% natural, eco-friendly, and sustainably sourced ingredients and we're not going to change that

settings.title: Innovation and Improvement
settings.text: We never settle. We’re constantly researching, innovating, and improving our products to bring you the best the world of supplements has to offer

settings.title: A Dash of Fun
settings.text: Health and wellness should be enjoyable! We infuse a bit of humor and fun into everything we do because a smile a day keeps the doctor away (or something like that)
